reviewText: A complete Gem!!., Actress Cecilia is a charmer, she should be recognized globally and the other cast members as well.
Again only on amazon i found this movie! It met all my expectations and more! !!

Espaol:

Esta pelicula esta buenisima. Es una produccion colombiana y me gusto mucho. Es sobre un tremendo personaje, un negro colombiano con tremenda personalidad y carisma llamado Ancizar. Lo que pasa, es que transporta cocaina. Y alli esta nuestro cuento.
Sus experiencas y triunfos en este mundo peligroso son la base del film. Por cierto, un tremendo film; muy real, no pretencioso. Me crei todo momento de la cinta. La recomiendo.

English:

This film is great. It's a Colombian production and I truly liked it. It's about a very cool, charismatic black protagonist of Colombian nationality named Ancizar.
The thing is, he transports cocaine. That's the basis of the story. His experiences and triumphs in this dangerous world are the base of the film.
A film which, as a matter of fact, is very real...true to life. It is a non-pretentious movie. I believed every second of the tale. I highly recommend it.
